Description: Stack for the CI/CD support infrastructure (EC2 Self-Hosted Runner)

Properties.GroupDescription: Security group for the EC2 self-hosted runner

SecurityGroupEgress.Description: Allow all outbound traffic by default

Properties.Description: IAM Role for the self-hosted runner EC2 instance

UserData.Fn::Base64:
#!/bin/bash
#!/bin/bash
dnf update -y
dnf install -y git jq docker
systemctl enable --now docker
usermod -aG docker ec2-user || true
echo "" | base64 -d > /home/ec2-user/setup_runner.sh
chown ec2-user:ec2-user /home/ec2-user/setup_runner.sh
chmod +x /home/ec2-user/setup_runner.sh
sudo -u ec2-user /home/ec2-user/setup_runner.sh

RunnerPublicIP.Description: Public IP address of the self-hosted runner EC2 instance.
